NAME: A+ Science AB
column9:
A+ Science is a Contract Research Organization (CRO) with long experience of services in clinical trials for pharmaceuticals (Phase I-IV), medical devices as well as non-interventional and registry trials. 

Our core expertise is in the Nordic countries, however through our close collaboration with other CROs, we are also able to cover many other countries. Our services include Clinical Trial Management, Pharmacovigilance (Pre-and Post-Marketing), Outsourcing of Consultants (short and long term solutions), City Site (Site Management Organization), Continuing Medical Education, Regulatory Services and many others. 

Since December 2013, A+ Science is a CRO run by its employees.

NAME: AB Carlsson och Möller
column9:
Carlsson & Möller, founded in 1948, is one of the leading companies in engineering plastics. The business comprises three main areas: Wholesaling, Mechanical processing of components and Materials and Application expertise.

C & M MedTech is a department within the company focused on engineering plastics for medical applications. 
C & M MedTech has extensive experience in engineering plastics in medical and biotechnical applications and offers specialist technical support and advisory services - from concept development and material selection, to prototyping and serial production.

Carlsson & Möller is part of Indutrade AB - a group with 170 companies in 25 countries and 4000 employees.

NAME: Abigo Medical AB
column9: ABIGO Medical AB is a globally expanding, integrated pharmaceutical company fully owned by the two brothers Jan. G and Leif Smith. A focus area and a research priority for ABIGO is infection control. In addition to the pharmaceutical products, ABIGO Medical has an advanced wound care product line. The Sorbact®-method is a unique Swedish invention for the effective management of wounds and dermal fungal infections. The Sorbact® wound management product line offers effective wound healing, including the prevention and management of infections. In addition, no known side effects or risk of microorganism resistance development has ever been demonstrated, a truly unique combination. Sorbact® is successfully sold in 65 countries.
column19: (u'Principal owners', u'Jan G. Smith, Leif Smith')

NAME: Acreo Swedish ICT AB
column9: Acreo Swedish ICT offers a Multi-disciplinary Innovation environment to take Life Science research concepts to manufacturable prototypes. Our Life Science focus is upon diagnostics and detection, research tools and eHealth-solutions. As your R&D-partner - we can assist in any stage of bringing new ideas to the market. We have the technology competence, we have the laboratories and test environments, we know prototyping, licensing and patents. And we have strong national and international networks – academic as well as business network. Acreo is part of Swedish ICT and RISE.

NAME: Active Biotech AB
column9: Active Biotech AB (publ) (Nasdaq Stockholm: ACTI) is a biotechnology company with focus on neurodegenerative diseases and cancer. Projects in pivotal phase are laquinimod, an orally administered small molecule with unique immunomodulatory properties for the treatment of multiple sclerosis, and tasquinimod, an oral immunomodulatory, anti-metastatic substance for the treatment of prostate cancer. The objective of the preclinical ISI project is to produce new, patentable chemical compounds for treatment of diseases in the company’s focus areas. Please visit www.activebiotech.com for more information.
column20: (u'Principal owners', u'MGA Holding AB, Nordstjernan AB, Investor')

NAME: Adlego Biomedical AB
MOTTO: A small enterprice with large capacities
column9: We are a team of professionals with long time experience of in-vivo pharmacology and toxicology. We assist pharmaceutical companies in their endeavours to find cures for diseases for which there are no effective treatments today and those who are working to improve the effectiveness of discovered drugs. Although we perform the standard studies needed to document the effect of new drug candidates we are always intersted in adding new effect models to our portfolio. In the development of effect models our extensive experience in pharmacology and physiology is fully utilized.

NAME: Advokatfirman Glimstedt
MOTTO: Legal service for Life Science companies
column9: Glimstedt is a full-service law firm with a unique geographic spread. In all, we have a staff of 260 at our offices in Sweden, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania and Belarus. Around 200 of us are lawyers. Within Life Sciences, we advise and assist in drafting and negotiating agreements regarding e.g. license agreements, research and development agreements, manufacturing and supply agreements, agreements regarding clinical studies and other agreements for the day-to-day business, as well as acquiring and divesting business lines. Glimstedt assists start-ups as well as established companies within the fields of biotechnology, medical technology and the food industry.

NAME: Alteco Medical AB
column9: Sepsis är en av de vanligaste dödsorsakerna inom den moderna intensivvården. Antalet patienter med sepsis har ökat med omkring 100 procent det senaste årtiondet. Vidare är sepsis den främsta dödsorsaken i samband med allvarliga infektioner, trots stora medicinska framsteg inom vaccinationer, antibiotika och avancerad intensivvård. Fler människor avlider årligen av sepsis än av HIV, lung-, bröst- och prostatacancer tillsammans och det finns ett mycket stort behov inom intensivvården av nya behandlingsmetoder för att förbättra överlevnaden bland patienter med sepsis. Alteco säljer den patenterade CE-märkta Alteco® LPS Adsorber som används till att behandla sepsis.

NAME: AnaMar AB
MOTTO: With focus on inflammation and fibrosis
column9: AnaMar is a  biopharmaceutical company deploying a selective peripheral serotonin (5-hydroxytryptamine or 5-HT) receptor platform to build a pipeline of clinical-stage drug development candidates targeting severe inflammatory and fibrotic diseases associated with high levels of morbidity and mortality. We address huge unmet medical needs as well as great market potentials. AnaMar has a unique technological platform with several drug candidates in development. We are a competent and dependable potential partner with sustainable financial backing. The Company is actively seeking and currently evaluating potential partnerships to help leverage and maximize its platform and accelerate development and commercialization of its pipeline.

NAME: APL - Apotek Produktion & Laboratorier AB
column9: APL offers laboratory, development and manufacturing services from single testing of active compounds to commercial manufacturing. With APL as a partner you receive a seamless process from early clinical phases through scale-up to full scale manufacturing. With a custom oriented approach and a transparent workflow we service all type of companies, from the small start-up to the global big pharma. We work with all common dosage forms and meet the quality requirements for global markets. Our expertise is based on more than 30 years experience in manufacturing pharmaceutical.

NAME: AssuransSelector AB
column9: AssuransSelector AB offers tailored, cost-effective insurance cover for the Life Science industry, such as:-Product Liability Insurance-Recall Insurance-Clinical Trials Insurance-Intellectual Property Rights Insurance-Directors & Officers Liability InsuranceWhether our client is in an early stage of development or is already a large manufacturer, we understand the risks and provide help in protecting the company against them.

NAME: AstraZeneca AB
column9: AstraZeneca är ett globalt, innovativt bioläkemedelsföretag med fokus på forskning, utveckling och marknadsföring av receptbelagda läkemedel, primärt för behandling av sjukdomar inom områdena hjärta/kärl/metabolism, andningsvägar/inflammation/autoimmunitet, cancer, infektion och neurovetenskap. AstraZeneca är verksamt i över 100 länder och våra innovativa läkemedel används av miljontals patienter världen över.
column21: (u'Principal owners', u'BlackRock. Inc, Invesco Limited, Axa SA, Investor AB')

NAME: Belach Bioteknik AB
column9: Belach is a company with 30 years experience in the field of bioprocess technology. Founding members established Belach Bioteknik AB in 1985 with the intention to supply the market with high quality fermentation equipment. Since then we have designed and manufactured qualified computer controlled bioreactor systems for cell and microbial cultivations used in research and production in most Swedish biopharmaceutical companies and research institutes. Over the years, Belach Bioteknik AB has become acknowledged on the Scandinavian biotech market for flexible services and long term customer care. Belach offers customized and scalable bioreactors ranging 1L - 5000L with state-of-the-art computer control and latest process analytical technology.

NAME: Biognos AB
column9: Biognos provides services in computational drug design especially virtual screening (in silico-screening) and lead optimization. Using our software and our computer cluster we can quickly identify potential lead compounds in large libraries of small molecules. Our ligand-based screening allows scoffold hopping and in many cases circumvention of patents. We offer our expertise mainly to  pharmaceutical companies. We have a special competence in the design of glycomimetic compounds. Biognos also provides services for academic groups.

NAME: BioThema AB
column9: BioThema uses its expertise in ATP and firefly luciferase for development and production of kits, e.g. the Microbial ATP Kit HS for the specific measurement of microbial ATP in the presence of ATP from other sources and our D-luciferin, which among 8 manufacturers has the highest activity.  BioThema applications include: 1) Rapid cell counting, cell proliferation and cytotoxicity. 2) Assays of enzymes and metabolites. 3) Reporter gene expression. 4) Hygiene monitoring in food industry and hospitals. 5) Drug discovery HTS. 6) Immunoassays. Customers include: A) Research institutes. B) Clinical diagnostics. C) Biotech industry. D) Food, beverages and water industries. E) Cleaning industry. F) Pharmaceutical industries.
column20: (u'Principal owners', u'Arne Lundin and Ulrika Lundin')

NAME: Business Region Göteborg- FDI-Life Science
column9:
Life Science is one of the main strengths of the Gothenburg region.
Several reasons why:
– A strong industrial sector.
– 450 Life Science companies.
– World-class excellence in scientific research.
–Long track record of innovation.
–Significant expertise in CVD and metabolic research; medical imaging, biomaterial, orthopedics, dental implants, stem cell research and transplantation.
–State‐of‐the‐art incubation facilities, laboratory spaces and commercial properties.

Business Region Göteborg creates arenas and networks where science and industry can meet. We convey contacts, make it easier for new players and provide momentum so development can continue. Quite simply, we are your link to a vital region.

NAME: ClinStorage AB
column9: For your valuable biological and pharmaceutical materials, we provide unique quality service with in depth knowledge making us highly suitable for clients´ entire need for storage, dispensing, release and distribution: Storage from room temperature down to -150º C and liquid nitrogen, Dispensing, labeling and packaging, Transportation and cold chain logistics, Batch release and certification (QP Release), Batch certification of imported medicinal products including 3rd countries and GMP audits. All service include high security with facility access and temperature control 24/7, including energy backup. ClinStorage is GMP certified by the Swedish Medical Products Agency.

NAME: ClinTec International Ltd.
column9: ClinTec International is a full service CRO providing high quality, flexible clinical research solutions since 1997.  Our pioneering approach has resulted in exceptional growth in over 40 countries worldwide while allowing us to maintain local management presences.  We have experience in all major therapeutic areas as well as orphan indications.  We can support or manage any Phase I-IV, BE, BA or medical device study.  We handle patient support to meet your timelines.  ClinTec is an ideal partner for start up biotechs, SME´s, Medtech and Pharma organisations throughout the development process.

NAME: Copenhagen Bio Science Park
column9:
COBIS is centrally located in Copenhagen in an environment of excellence when it comes to knowledge and commercial use of biotechnology, medicine, and pharmacology. The space is exceptional. A 12,000 square meter building of modern architecture with lab facilities and offices.

We have something to offer you regardless of whether you represent an established life science company, a CRO , or even if you simply have a good idea and need help to get started.

Our location is ideal. We are centrally located between Denmark’s leading hospitals and major universities – in the heart of the world's strongest biotech region, Medicon Valley and only minutes away from the centre of Copenhagen.
column19: (u'Principal owners', u'Scion DTU, Symbion Science Park')

NAME: CTC Clinical Trial Consultants AB
column9:
CTC AB is a privately owned CRO with focus on clinical conduct of hospital-based early phase clinical trials (phase 0/I IIa) in patients and healthy volunteers in a dedicated 12-bed research clinic at the University hospital in Uppsala combined with two SMO sites in Uppsala and Linköping for phase II/III studies. 
The research clinic at the University hospital in Uppsala is approved by the Medical Products Agency for First-in-Human studies. 
Our experts can support your company throughout the translational phase to get an early indication of proof of mechanism/concept in patients/volunteers.

NAME: Hansa Medical AB (publ)
column9:
Hansa Medical is a biopharmaceutical company focused on novel immunomodulatory enzymes. Its lead project IdeS is an antibody-degrading enzyme in Phase II clinical development, with potential use in transplantation and rare autoimmune diseases.

Other projects include HBP-assay, a market-launched diagnostic marker for severe sepsis, and EndoS, an antibody-modulating bacterial en¬zyme in pre-clinical development. The company is based in Lund, Sweden. Hansa Medical’s share (HMED) is listed on Nasdaq First North in Stockholm, with Remium Nordic AB as Certified Adviser.

NAME: Intervacc AB
column9: Intervacc arbetar med att utveckla nya vacciner mot bakteriella infektioner, framför allt inom veterinärområdet. Fokus ligger i främsta hand på att ta fram ett vaccin mot Streptococcus equi som orsakar kvarka på häst. Detta är en mycket smittsam och allvarlig infektion som medför mycket höga kostnader inom hästnäringen och behovet av ett vaccin är därför stort. Vaccinet som Intervacc utvecklat (Strangvac) baseras på rekombinanta proteiner  och har därför en mycket god säkerhetsprofil utan biverkningar. Strangvac genomgår för närvarande slutliga kliniska prövningar. Intervacc förvärvade under 2014 Nordvacc Läkemedel som ingår som dotterbolag i koncernen. Nordvacc arbetar med försäljning av veterinära läkemedel och vacciner.

NAME: IRW Consulting AB
column9: IRW is a Nordic full-service CRO with our own offices and staff in Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland with more than 15 years of experience of Clinical Research Outsourcing in Scandinavia. We offer cost efficient services in Clinical Operations, Project Management, Data Management/ePRO, Biostatistics, Pharmacovigilance, Regulatory and Medical Writing for a large range of customers in Biotech and Big Pharma. IRW has ongoing assignments in all development phases. Our studies run in the Nordics as well as in other regions with the assistance of our well established CRO partner network. IRW’s dynamic approach to the changing clinical trials environment makes us uniquely positioned as the preferred Nordic CRO.

NAME: Karolinska Development AB
column9: Karolinska Development aims to create value for patients, researchers, investors and society by developing innovations from world class science into differentiated products that can be partnered. The business model is to: SELECT the most commercially attractive medical innovations that can potentially satisfy unmet medical needs; DEVELOP innovations to the stage where the greatest return on investment can be achieved; and COMMERCIALIZE the innovations through the sale of companies or out-licensing of products.

NAME: Karolinska Institutet Innovations AB
column9: KI Innovations turns promising biomedical research into new products and applications to improve global health and well being. KI Innovations drives the development process by providing project management, funding for patent protection, legal advice, business development and has an extensive network with the international pharmaceutical industry. KI Innovations has reviewed more than 1400 academic innovations, created 40 start-ups and has signed 35 license agreements. KI Innovations has a close collaboration with the Karolinska Development AB.

NAME: Karolinska Institutet Science Park AB
column9: Based at Karolinska Institutet's campuses, KI Science Park is the home to over 80 companies, operating in healthcare, pharmaceutical, diagnostics and medical technologies. Proximity to cutting-edge research and education, world-leading University hospitals and an unrivalled, dynamic milieu for commercializing research concepts are factors that make the extraordinary environment. The Park offers office premises, laboratory facilities and life science-specific support, to facilitate companies’ challenging journey to success.

NAME: Kemwell AB
MOTTO: CDMO services with turn key solutions
column9:
Kemwell operates manufacturing facilities in India and Sweden and employing 1000 people worldwide. 
We are a family-owned company, with a focus on long term strategies. 
Kemwell is a provider of contract manufacturing and development services for the pharmaceutical- and biotech industry globally.
Kemwell is your ideal strategic partner in:
• Formulation development
• Analytical support
• Clinical batch production
• EU gateway release
• Commercial-scale  manufacturing
• Packaging
• Distribution world wide
• One-stop shop solutions

NAME: Ladulaas Clinical Trials
column9:
Our team is educated and trained in ICH-GCP and we are long experienced in conducting clinical trials, phase II to V.

We have been working together with most of the major global pharmaceutical and CRO companies and we also cooperate with medical faculties all over the world.

We know the importance of fast recruitment, well treatment and security to make the participants fulfill the whole protocol. We have participated in trials from migraine to onychomycosis….

Try us for Trials!

NAME: Mannheimer Swartling Advokatbyrå
column9: Mannheimer Swartling is the leading business law firm in the Nordic region. We are a full service firm with an extensive international experience. Our Life Science team has longstanding and extensive experience in the Life Science sector and advises in all areas from research and development to market authorisation and distribution of the final product and life cycle management issues. Our clients include multinational corporations as well as start-ups and other entrepreneurial ventures in the pharmaceutical, biotechnical, medical devices and food industry.

NAME: Medeon AB
MOTTO: The best location in Medicon Valley
column9:
Medeon Scienc Park provides a creative environment for new and established companies. Our focus is directed at knowledge-intensive businesses within life science: pharmaceutical development, medical technology, biotechnology and health care. At Medeon you gain access to:

Suitable premises with the opportunity to build new facilities

Close cooperation with health care and the University

Strong network and incubator functions

Good services with, for example, reception, switchboard, travel agency and restaurant
column14:
Medeon Science Park
Per Albin Hanssons väg 41
20512 Malmö

NAME: Medicago AB
column9:
Founded in 1995 in Uppsala, Sweden, Medicago is celebrating 20 years of continuous service to the life-science and biotechnology industry. We are privately-owned, enthusiastic, and operate throughout the world. We keep quality in focus (ISO 9001 and ISO 13485 certified). Medicago is active both as a CRO/CMO (contract research/manufacturing organisation) as well as a worldwide provider of our own biotech products.
We offer contract development/manufacturing and customized services. We have facilities for aseptic filling and freeze drying.
Our own products comprises user-friendly reagents SmartBuffers™ (pre-made dry buffers), Lectins, as well as research and biochemical kits and reagents. Bulk amounts are available on request.

NAME: Medicon Village
column9:
Medicon Village is a life science village for research, innovation and business for people´s health and wellbeing. Today we house 1200 people in more than 100 organisations working in pharma, medtech, biotech, nano- and e-health. Medicon Village is a progressive platform for cutting-edge research and innovation in the fields of prevention, diagnostics, treatment and care. We believe that interdisciplinary exchange is a key driver in creating growth. Medicon Village is a venue for exchange of ideas, hosting a large number of life science seminars and events. 

Welcome to visit Medicon Village´s high quality laboratories and offices, all with full service to create your breeding ground for successful development and growth.
column21: (u'Principal owners', u'Mats Paulsson Foundation for research, innovation and societal development.')

NAME: Mercodia AB
column9: Mercodia AB is a Swedish biotech company focusing on the development of immunoassays for research within the field of metabolic disorders, cardiovascular disease and diabetes. Our assays are applicable to both animal and human models and are used for research ranging from basic scientific studies to large pre-clinical and clinical phase trials. The company was founded in 1991 and is today a world-leading supplier of products to all major international markets. More than ninety percent of our production is exported from our facilities in Uppsala to approximately 100 different countries around the world.

NAME: MetaSafe AB
column9:
MetaSafe AB is a partner laboratory offering high qualitative mass-spectrometric analyses to reveal biotransformation and metabolism characteristics of drugs during all stages of pharmaceutical development. MetaSafe is situated in the Biovation Park Telge in Södertälje.
MetaSafe provides any pharmaceutical company or academic group design and execution of exploratory, problem-solving, non-regulatory or regulatory biotransformation studies that enable progression of their drug projects.

NAME: Mikrolab Stockholm AB
column9:
Mikrolab is a leading provider of contract microbiology services to the pharmaceutical-, cosmetic- and medical device industry. We support you in every phase of your development and manufacturing process from raw material testing to final product release testing. 

We have a GMP certificate from the Swedish Medical Products Agency and a ISO 17025 Accreditation. 

- We perform sterility testing in our clean room GMP grade A -
- Total count and Bioburden testing -
- Endotoxin Detection -
- We perform tests for specific microorganisms -
- Closure Integrity studies, Bacterological and blue dye ingress -
- Customer specific studies and many other laboratory services -
Affiliate company: MKL Diagnostics AB
www.mikrolab.se

NAME: NDA Group AB
column9:
We support life science companies all over the world and across all phases of development, from pre-clinical to post marketing, to the needs and requirements of regulators and payers alike. We work together with our clients to address key strategic regulatory and reimbursement challenges. Our scientific expertise covers all major therapeutic areas.

The advice you get from NDA is from real experts in the industry, many who have been involved in shaping today’s regulatory, HTA and pharmacovigilance environment. We have close to 100 employees across Europe. More than 25% are ex EU regulators.

With our support, you can cut the time and associated cost it takes to get your products to market, and keep them there.

NAME: Nordic Biolabs AB
column9:
Nordic Biolabs AB represents leading brands in our 4 business areas: Biotechnology, Transfusion Medicine, Clinical Diagnostics and Industrial Microbiology/Hygien Controle.
Nordic Biolabs shall through a combination of competence and a well balanced product portfolio offer customers an unique partnership and participate in the technical development. We keep this statement vivid every day by introducing new products, finding new innovative suppliers, giving lectures and seminars and always be keen on our customers needs
column21: (u'Principal owners', u'Jan Skaring, Claes Hedberg, Thomas Busch')

NAME: Optimize Courier (Sweden) AB
column9: Optimize Courier is a global specialty and GDP compliant courier company dedicated to the worldwide coordination & transportation of biological, pharmaceutical, time critical and cold chain logistics. Operating 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with decades of experience behind us, we promise to go the extra mile every day to ensure you receive the highest level of service and value with each shipment you entrust to us.

NAME: Pharma Consulting Group AB
MOTTO: The CRO where knowledge meets technology
column9: PCG Clinical Services is a Scandinavian full-service CRO with established collaborations with organisations, enabling us to provide full service coverage for our customers – locally and globally. We combine front-line technology with CRO-services featuring requirements needed for data handling, analysis and reporting for customers in the pharma/biotech arena and academia. Our experienced project managers and biometric experts is the cornerstone of PCG, and has enabled us to develop services within monitoring, medical writing and pharmacovigilance. Our in-house developed EDC system Viedoc is used throughout our services and enables us and our customers to do things better. We work with the world’s most advanced and demanding companies.

NAME: Pharmanest AB
column9: Pharmanest is developing unique pain relief formulations based on well-known active substances. The formulations are applied topically in the cervix and uterus using applicators developed in-house. Pain relief is obtained immediately, no advanced instrumentation is required and the systemic effect is minimized. Pharmanest's first product candidate has been developed for use in local pain relief in connection with the insertion of IUDs. With its candidate products. Pharmanest hopes to be able to offer effective local pain relief which is advantageous from both the patient and health economics perspectives.
column13:
Karolinska Institutet Science Park, Retzius väg 8, 171 65 Solna
17165 Solna

NAME: PolyPeptide Laboratories AB
column9: The PolyPeptide Group specializes in contract GMP manufacturing of peptide therapeutics. In consultation with the customer, Polypeptide Group can examine several potentially commercially relevant manufacturing strategies, and proceed by conducting a pilot manufacturing study. This can be followed by scaling-up the optimized strategy, stepwise introduction of GMP, process validation, progress to registration lots, stability studies and compilation of an appropriate US or European drug master file.

NAME: Recipharm AB
column9: Recipharm is a leading CDMO (Contract Development and Manufacturing Organisation) in the pharmaceutical industry based in Sweden employing some 1,500 employees. Recipharm offers manufacturing services of pharmaceuticals in various dosage forms, production of clinical trial material and pharmaceutical product development. Recipharm currently manufactures more than 200 different products to both Big Pharma and smaller research- and development companies. Recipharm’s turnover is approximately SEK 2.1 billion and the Company operates development and manufacturing facilities in Sweden, France, the UK, Germany and Spain and is headquartered near Stockholm.

NAME: Scandinavian CRO AB
column9: Scandinavian CRO is a full service Contract Research Organisation offering both consultancy and specific, stand-alone services. Scandinavian CRO is an organization that provides support to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device industries in the form of research services outsourced on a contract basis. From study design to study report.

NAME: Scandinavian Development Services
column9:
At Scandinavian Development Services we specialise in all regulatory and scientific aspects in the drug development process, from the initial project idea through to the completely developed product. We have expertise in formulation development, non-clinical program planning and, communication with regulatory authorities for development programs, including clinical programs. We are also experts in medical statistics!

Our ambition is to solve the tricky questions which have no obvious answers. To do so we have built an experienced team of specialists within the field of drug development and biostatistics. When required, we have a network of Swedish and international experts with regulatory, medicinal and statistical expert knowledge.

NAME: TATAA Biocenter AB
column9: TATAA Biocenter is Europe’s leading provider of gene expression profiling services, a prime organizer of hands-on training in quantitative real-time PCR (qPCR) and the most complete provider of qPCR products in Sweden. Our offer comprises the entire field of qPCR services, including commissioned services and research projects, hands-on training and highest quality products. Our services include sample extraction, gene expression analysis, SNP typing, qPCR data analysis and much more. We are ISO 17025 certified.

NAME: TFS International AB
column9: TFS International is the largest global independent clinical Contract Research Organization (CRO). Founded in 1996 in Sweden, TFS currently operates in over 20 countries throughout Europe, USA, Canada and Japan and employs more than 650 professionals. TFS core therapeutic areas of expertise are Oncology, Immunology, Dermatology, Ophthalmology, CNS, Cardiology and Endocrinology. Through two business areas, TFS DevelopTM and TFS PeopleTM, TFS provides services worldwide as end-to-end solutions or tactical functional services. Detailed information about TFS, its business offerings, global locations and recent press releases can be obtained through www.tfscro.com.

NAME: Umecrine Mood AB
column9:
Umecrine Mood AB is developing a novel treatment the symptoms associated with Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder (PMDD), a condition affecting about 5% of all women in fertile age. This is a condition that have great impact on the quality of life for the patients and her family. 
In addition to a few lead compounds in preclincal stage, the company's selected candidate drug is the first in class of so called GAMSA (GABA-A receptor modulating steroid antagonists). 
The discovery of these compounds are based on research from Umeå university. The company is part of the Karolinska Development company portfolio
column13:
Fogdevreten 2
Karolinska Institutet Science Park
17165 Solna

NAME: Vironova
column9:
Vironova AB (publ) is a privately held Swedish biotech company dedicated to the development of novel antiviral therapeutics and virus diagnostics products to combat and prevent the spread of viral diseases. Based on proprietary technology to analyze viruses and nanoparticles by electron microscopy, Vironova also provides services for the bio-nanotech industry that is able to cut time and costs in development and production of nanoparticle based therapeutics.

The subsidiary Vironova Biosafety offers the expertise and know-how in ensuring virus safety in the manufacture of biopharmaceuticals.

NAME: VWR International AB
MOTTO: All you need for your laboratory
column9: VWR (NASDAQ: VWR), headquartered in Radnor, Pennsylvania, is a global laboratory supply and distribution company with worldwide sales in excess of  $4.1 billion in 2013. VWR enables the advancement of the world´s most critical research through the distribution of a highly diversified product line to most of the world´s top pharmaceutical and biotech companies, as well as industrial, educational and governmental organizations. VWR has over 7000 associates around the world working to streamline the way researchers across North America, Europe, and Asia stock and maintain their labs.

NAME: World Courier (Sweden) AB
column9: Trust. It’s why more leading pharmaceutical companies rely on World Courier than any other specialty logistics company in the world. Companies trust us to transport their time- and temperature-sensitive products because they value the peace of mind that comes with our unsurpassed knowledge, global reach and flawless supply chain execution. No other specialty logistics company has the experienced personnel, global offices and in-market expertise required to ensure the optimal handling, transport and delivery of vital healthcare products. When trust is absolutely essential, there’s only one choice: World Courier
